mapper.select: select * from member order by m_idx
select * from ( select m.*, rank() over(order by m_idx desc) as no from (select * from member order by m_idx)m )a where no between #{ start } and #{ end }
select * from member where m_idx=#{ m_idx }
mapper.insert:
insert into member(m_id,m_pwd,m_name,m_jumin,m_addr,m_detail_addr,m_zipcode,m_email,m_phone,m_local,m_grade,m_regdate)
values(#{ m_id}, #{ m_pwd },#{ m_name },#{ m_jumin },#{ m_addr }, #{ m_detail_addr }, #{ m_zipcode }, #{ m_email },#{ m_phone },#{ m_local }, default, now() )
mapper.delete: delete from member where m_idx=#{ m_idx }
mapper.update: update member set m_id=#{ m_id }, m_pwd=#{ m_pwd }, m_name=#{ m_name }, m_jumin=#{ m_jumin }, m_addr=#{ m_addr }, m_detail_addr=#{ m_detail_addr }, m_zipcode=#{ m_zipcode }, m_email=#{ m_email }, m_phone=#{ m_phone }, m_local=#{ m_local }, m_grade=default, m_regdate=now() where m_idx=#{ m_idx }
